ip_address.title: IP Address
ip_address.description: The IP address of the platinum gateway box.

statusPollingSeconds.title: Status Polling (Seconds)
statusPollingSeconds.description: Status (blind position) is fetched on demand as needed, and is also polled for use in automatations. By default this is done every 60 seconds.

setPositionDelayMsecs.title: Set Position Delay (Msecs)
setPositionDelayMsecs.placeholder: delay setting blind position for __ msecs
setPositionDelayMsecs.description: How long to delay setting the blind position after it changes. This smooths (debounces) things out when you are dragging slider. By default this is 2500 msecs.

setPositionThrottleRateMsecs.title: Set Position Throttle (Msecs)
setPositionThrottleRateMsecs.description: This throttles the time between sending set commands to gateway. By default this is 5000 msecs.

createVirtualRoomBlind.title: Create Virtual Room Blind
createVirtualRoomBlind.description: Creates a virtual blind for each room that contains all the blinds in the room. Default is true.

createDiscreteBlinds.title: Create Discrete Blinds
createDiscreteBlinds.description: Creates a blind for each real blind.

prefixRoomNameToBlindName.title: Prefix Room Name
prefixRoomNameToBlindName.description: Prefix the room name to each discrete blind name.

visibleBlindNames.title: Visible Blind Names
visibleBlindNames.description: Optional. Comma-seperated list of blind names (prefixed with room name) to make visible. All other blinds are ignored. Used only if 'Create Discrete Blinds' is true.

topDownBottomUpBehavior.title: Top-Down / Bottom-Up Behavior
topDownBottomUpBehavior.description: Choose the desired behavior for Top-Down / Bottom-Up shades.  If 'Top-Down' is specified, the slider will control the middle rail, and the shade will open downward.  If 'Bottom-Up' is specified, the slider will control the bottom rail, and the shade will open upward.  Default is 'Top-Down.'
